channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - browser

item.title: My application base: firefox
item.description: Browsers are becoming application disclosure frameworks rather than the visualization tools they were in the past. More and more services, like the Draw.io one I discussed not that long ago, are using browsers are their client side while retaining the full capabilities of end clients (such as drag and â€¦
